citations.narrative:
** The facility does not have a current program of veterinary care for dogs. The last program of veterinary care for dogs
was dated 05-2023. The facility must develop a program of veterinary care for dogs in writing and signed by the attending
veterinarian. The program must include all preventative vaccines to include rabies, all parasitic preventions including
testing for internal parasites. A hand on head to tail exam by a veterinarian and a site visit not less than once every twelve
months. Also include methods to ensure healthy hair coats, healthy and clean eyes, ears, skin and teeth. All licensees
with regulated dogs are required to have a program of veterinary care for dogs to provide for the health and well-being of
the dogs. To be corrected by: 11-08-2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
** The facility does not have a current program of veterinary care for dogs. The last program of veterinary care for dogs 
was dated 05-2023. The facility must develop a program of veterinary care for dogs in writing and signed by the attending 
veterinarian. The program must include all preventative vaccines to include rabies, all parasitic preventions including 
testing for internal parasites. A hand on head to tail exam by a veterinarian and a site visit not less than once every twelve 
months. Also include methods to ensure healthy hair coats, healthy and clean eyes, ears, skin and teeth. All licensees 
with regulated dogs are required to have a program of veterinary care for dogs to provide for the health and well-being of 
the dogs. To be corrected by: 11-08-2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
